title: Find Zevlor
content: m he froze and tried to surrender. We should look for him. The tieflings were captured and brought to Moonrise Towers, but Zevlor isn't with them. His fellow tieflings are angry with him - claiming he wanted to surrender. Some even think he was secretly a cultist. Something happened with Zevlor and the tieflings out in the darkness - something bad. And it sounds like the tieflings blame him for it. We should find out more. We found the tieflings, but Zevlor isn't with them. They claim he wanted
